titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Debate Association Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:28

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, annual reports, budget and accounting records, rosters, memoranda, photographs and general administrative records concerning the activities of Rollin G. Osterweis as director of the Yale Debate Association.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 40 (YRG 40), Records of Yale clubs, societies, and organizations.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Debate Association Records (RU 75). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are aranged in two series: I. Correspondence, 1948-1974. II. Subject Files, 1948-1980; and subsequent accessions.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Yale Debate Association was founded in 1908.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, annual reports, budget and accounting records, rosters, memoranda, photographs and general administrative records concerning the activities of Rollin G. Osterweis as director of the Yale Debate Association.
